Hello LowEndTalk! At SoftShellWeb we have prepared some special affordable and reliable KVM VPS plans with high bandwidth, in-house DDoS Protection and consistent performance, ready for all types of use. 

We provide latest Linux OS Templates and you can also upload your Custom OS ISO.

----

> **KVM-SSD-1GB - From $3.00/mo - [Order Now](https://softshellweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=65)**
> 1 Core @ 2.6 Ghz
> 1 GB ECC RAM
> 20 GB SSD Storage
> 2000 GB @ 1 Gbps (connection speed is limited to 100Mbit when bandwidth exceeded)
>1x Dedicated IPv4
>1x IPv6 /64 Subnet
> DDoS Protection 600+ Gbps
> Virtualizor control panel
> Location: Wormer, Netherlands

---

> **KVM-SSD-3GB - From $7.00/mo - [Order Now](https://softshellweb.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=67)**

---

**Q: Do you offer ddos Protection?**
**A:** Yes, all our hosting plans come with DDoS Protection included into the price. Our in-house DDoS Mitigation can filter Attacks up to 600+ Gbps.

**Q: Can I Install a Custom OS ISO Available?**
**A:** Yes, you can upload your Custom OS ISO Available inside the Virtualizor control panel. 

**Q: Is SoftShellWeb Eco-Friendly?**
**A:** Yes, our datacenter is powered by green energy and we use natural cooling when the outside temperature is below 21°C.

**Q: Are there any hidden charges?**
**A:** No! Not with us, there are no hidden charges with any of SoftShellWeb's services or products. 

**Q: Where are the servers located?**
**A:** The servers are located in Wormer, Netherlands. 

**Q: Is SoftShellWeb a reseller?**
**A:** No, SoftShellWeb is not a reseller. We own all of our equipement and constantly expanding our capacities.

**Q: Can I have adult contect on my website?**
**A:** Yes this is fine as long as it is legal within the Netherlands and European Union. 

**Q: Do you have an affiliate program?**
**A:** Yes! We offer a very competitive 10% recurring commission affiliate program; for more details visit our website!

**Q: My order has been marked as Fraud?**
**A:** Please open a support ticket, our staff will manually review your order.

---
